videos.headline: USM answers  with TD catch
videos.description: Allenzae Staggers bobbles the football, gathers it and beats defenders into the end zone for a 42-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: ULM gets INT in the end zone
videos.description: Corey Straughter intercepts Kwadra Griggs' pass to prevent a touch down.

videos.headline: USM's Smith big run gets him over 200 yards rushing for the game
videos.description: Ito Smith's 44-yard run caps off a big performance, leading Southern Mississippi to victory.
